\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{prefix}} \textendash{} Prefix in output (whether it is training, validation or test set)

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{accs\_arr}} \textendash{} Array where accuracies should be stored

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{losses\_arr}} \textendash{} Array where losses should be stored

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{labels\_arr}} \textendash{} Array where predicted labels should be stored

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{device}} \textendash{} Device where model is stored

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{data\_loader}} \textendash{} Data loader for either a training,validate or test set

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{train}} \textendash{} Should optimization take place in each batch

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{optimizer}} \textendash{} Model optimizer

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{loss\_func}} \textendash{} Used loss function

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{loss\_penalty}} \textendash{} Multiplier of loss function (for validate and tests in order to compare to training set)

\end{itemize}

\sphinxlineitem{Returns}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Accuracy and loss in epoch

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}
